control.visible: [substring(ListItem.FileExtension,iso) | substring(ListItem.FileExtension,img) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvd) | substring(ListItem.FileExtension,ifo) | substring(ListItem.FileExtension,vob) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvdrip) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvdr5) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,.r5) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvdscreener) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvdscr) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,screener)] + ![substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,hddvd) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,hd-dvd)]
